author: Henry Longfellow
message: He that respects himself is safe from others; he wears a coat of mail that none can pierce.
title: Thought of the day

author: Wayne Dyer
message: I cannot always control what goes on outside. But I can always control what goes on inside.
title: Thought of the day

author: Daisaku Ikeda
message: What matters is the value we've created in our lives, the people we've made happy and how much we've grown as people.
title: Thought of the day

author: Epictetus
message: When you are offended at any man's fault, turn to yourself and study your own failings. Then you will forget your anger.
title: Thought of the day
